parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call [ListInstances](~~470439~~) to obtain the instance ID.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description:
The metric type. Valid values:

*   GpuCoreUsage: the GPU utilization.
*   GpuMemoryUsage: the GPU memory utilization.
*   CpuCoreUsage: the CPU utilization.
*   MemoryUsage: the memory utilization.
*   NetworkInputRate: the network ingress rate.
*   NetworkOutputRate: the network egress rate.
*   DiskReadRate: the disk read rate.
*   DiskWriteRate: the disk write rate.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query.

parameters.name: TimeStep
parameters.description: The interval at which metrics are returned. Unit: minutes.
